suggestions.title: Enhance Email Enrichment Strategy
suggestions.description: Implement multiple email finder services and website scraping to increase email success rate
suggestions.rationale: Current email success rate is 1.4%. Need to improve to reach target of 50%+
suggestions.implementation:
1. Add Apollo.io API integration
2. Implement website email scraping with better patterns
3. Add email verification service
4. Create fallback strategies for failed enrichments

suggestions.title: Add Advanced Lead Filtering and Search
suggestions.description: Implement advanced filtering, search, and bulk operations for better lead management
suggestions.rationale: Managing 147 leads requires better organization tools
suggestions.implementation:
1. Add search functionality
2. Implement multi-select and bulk operations
3. Add lead scoring and prioritization
4. Create saved filters and views

suggestions.title: Implement Email Sequence Automation
suggestions.description: Create automated email sequences with follow-ups and personalization
suggestions.rationale: Single emails have low response rates. Sequences can improve engagement by 300%
suggestions.implementation:
1. Create email sequence templates
2. Add sequence scheduling logic
3. Implement response tracking
4. Add sequence management UI

suggestions.title: Add Instagram DM Automation
suggestions.description: Automate Instagram direct messages for leads without email addresses
suggestions.rationale: Instagram leads often don't have emails. DMs can reach them directly
suggestions.estimatedImpact: Reach 40% more leads through Instagram DMs
suggestions.implementation:
1. Integrate Instagram Graph API
2. Create DM templates
3. Add DM scheduling and automation
4. Implement DM response tracking
